entry.title: Saturday night: Ice pellets or snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow or freezing rain changing to ice pellets mixed with freezing rain this evening then to snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
